00031 class RealBase: public Function {
00032     public:
00035         typedef VecMath::Vector<4> &function_type(double, double, double);
00037         typedef VecMath::Vector<4> raw_function_type (double, double, double);
00038 
00039         RealBase() { }
00041         RealBase(const QString &name,
00042                  double _tmin, double _tmax, double _dt,
00043                  double _umin, double _umax, double _du,
00044                  double _vmin, double _vmax, double _dv,
00045                  ParameterMap _parms = ParameterMap()):
00046                 Function(name, _parms),
00047                 tmin (_tmin), tmax (_tmax), dt (_dt),
00048                 umin (_umin), umax (_umax), du (_du),
00049                 vmin (_vmin), vmax (_vmax), dv (_dv),
00050                 tsteps (unsigned ((tmax-tmin)/dt+1)),
00051                 usteps (unsigned ((umax-umin)/du+1)),
00052                 vsteps (unsigned ((vmax-vmin)/dv+1)) { }
00053 
00054     protected:
00056         unsigned &getTsteps() { return tsteps; }
00058         unsigned getTsteps() const { return tsteps > 0? tsteps: 1; }
00060         unsigned &getUsteps() { return usteps; }
00062         unsigned getUsteps() const { return usteps > 0? usteps: 1; }
00064         unsigned &getVsteps()  { return vsteps; }
00066         unsigned getVsteps() const { return vsteps > 0? vsteps: 1; }
00067 
00068         double &getTmin() { return tmin; }          
00069         double getTmin() const { return tmin; }     
00070         double &getTmax() { return tmax; }          
00071         double getTmax() const { return tmax; }     
00072         double &getDt() { return dt; }              
00073         const double &getDt() const { return dt; }  
00074         double &getUmin() { return umin; }          
00075         double getUmin() const { return umin; }     
00076         double &getUmax() { return umax; }          
00077         double getUmax() const { return umax; }     
00078         double &getDu() { return du; }              
00079         const double &getDu() const { return du; }  
00080         double &getVmin() { return vmin; }          
00081         double getVmin() const { return vmin; }     
00082         double &getVmax() { return vmax; }          
00083         double getVmax() const { return vmax; }     
00084         double &getDv() { return dv; }              
00085         const double &getDv() const { return dv; }  
00086 
00088         virtual VecMath::Vector<4> &f(double, double, double) = 0;
00090 
00094         VecMath::Vector<4> &operator () (double t, double u, double v) {
00095             return f(t,u,v);
00096         }
00097 
00098     private:
00099         double tmin, 
00100                tmax, 
00101                dt,   
00102                umin, 
00103                umax, 
00104                du,   
00105                vmin, 
00106                vmax, 
00107                dv;   
00108         unsigned tsteps, 
00109                  usteps, 
00110                  vsteps; 
00111 };

00125 class RealFunction: public RealBase {
00126     public:
00127         RealFunction (const QString &name,
00128                       double _tmin, double _tmax, double _dt,
00129                       double _umin, double _umax, double _du,
00130                       double _vmin, double _vmax, double _dv,
00131                       ParameterMap _parms = ParameterMap());
00132         virtual ~RealFunction() { }
00133 
00134         virtual void Transform (const VecMath::Rotation<4> &R,
00135                                 const VecMath::Vector<4> &T);
00136         virtual void Project (double ScrW, double CamW, bool DepthCue4D);
00137         virtual void Draw (void);
00138 
00139         virtual void ReInit(double _tmin, double _tmax, double _dt,
00140                             double _umin, double _umax, double _du,
00141                             double _vmin, double _vmax, double _dv);
00142 
00144         virtual const unsigned getDefinitionSpaceDimensions() { return 3; }
00145 
00146     protected:
00147         VecMath::Vector<4> &normal(double t, double u, double v);
00148 
00149         void DrawPlane (unsigned);
00150         void DrawStrip (unsigned, unsigned);
00151         void DrawCube (unsigned, unsigned, unsigned);
00152 
00153         virtual void Initialize (void);
00154         virtual void InitMem (void);
00155 
00156         vec4vec3D X,      
00157                   Xtrans; 
00158         vec3vec3D Xscr;   
00159 
00160         VecMath::Vector<4> F;
00161 
00162 
00163 };

00166 /*******************************************************************************
00167  *
00168  *  classes which implement RealFunction::f (double, double, double) follow
00169  *  the descendants may also implement Function::df () and Function::normal (),
00170  *  but need not
00171  */
00172

00184 class Hypersphere: public RealFunction {
00185     public:
00186         Hypersphere (double _tmin, double _tmax, double _dt,
00187                      double _umin, double _umax, double _du,
00188                      double _vmin, double _vmax, double _dv,
00189                      double _rad = 1);
00190         virtual ~Hypersphere() { }
00191         virtual void SetParameters(const ParameterMap &);
00192 
00193     protected:
00194         virtual function_type f;
00195         virtual function_type normal;
00196 
00197         double Radius;
00198 };

00208 class Torus1: public RealFunction {
00209     public:
00210         Torus1 (double _tmin, double _tmax, double _dt,
00211                 double _umin, double _umax, double _du,
00212                 double _vmin, double _vmax, double _dv,
00213                 double _R = 2, double _r = 1, double _rho = 0.5);
00214         virtual ~Torus1() { }
00215         virtual void SetParameters(const ParameterMap &parms) {
00216     //  parms["Radius"].value must be set!
00217 #if 1
00218     for (ParameterMap::const_iterator i = parms.begin(); i != parms.end(); ++i) {
00219         if (i->second->getName() == "Major Radius") R = double(*i->second);
00220         if (i->second->getName() == "Minor Radius") r = double(*i->second);
00221         if (i->second->getName() == "Micro Radius") rho = double(*i->second);
00222     }
00223 #else
00224     setParameter(parms, this->R, "Major Radius");
00225     setParameter(parms, this->r, "Minor Radius");
00226     setParameter(parms, this->rho, "Micro Radius");
00227 #endif
00228 }
00229 
00230     protected:
00231         virtual function_type f;
00232 
00233         double R;       
00234         double r;       
00235         double rho;     
00236 };

00248                 double _vmin, double _vmax, double _dv,
00249                 double _R = 1, double _r = 0.5);
00250         virtual ~Torus2 () { }
00251         virtual void SetParameters(const ParameterMap &parms) {
00252             //  parms["Radius"].value must be set!
00253 #if 1
00254             for (ParameterMap::const_iterator i = parms.begin();
00255                  i != parms.end(); ++i) {
00256                 if (i->second->getName() == "Major Radius")
00257                     R = double(*i->second);
00258                 if (i->second->getName() == "Minor Radius")
00259                     r = double(*i->second);
00260             }
00261 #else
00262             setParameter(parms, this->R, "Major Radius");
00263             setParameter(parms, this->r, "Minor Radius");
00264 #endif
00265         }
00266 
00267     protected:
00268         virtual function_type f;
00269 
00270         double R;   
00271         double r;   
00272 };

00299 class GravitationPotential: public RealFunction {
00300     public:
00301         GravitationPotential (double _tmin, double _tmax, double _dt,
00302                               double _umin, double _umax, double _du,
00303                               double _vmin, double _vmax, double _dv,
00304                               double _M = 1, double _R = 0.25);
00305         virtual ~GravitationPotential () { }
00306         virtual void SetParameters(const ParameterMap &parms) {
00307 #if 1
00308             for (ParameterMap::const_iterator i = parms.begin();
00309                  i != parms.end(); ++i) {
00310                 if (i->second->getName() == "M") M = double(*i->second);
00311                 if (i->second->getName() == "R") R = double(*i->second);
00312             }
00313 #else
00314             setParameter(parms, this->M, "M");
00315             setParameter(parms, this->R, "R");
00316 #endif
00317         }
00318 
00319     protected:
00320         virtual function_type f;
00321 
00322         double M,               //  not really M, but M/R^3
00323                R;
00324 };

00376 class PolarSin: public RealFunction {
00377     public:
00378         PolarSin (double _tmin, double _tmax, double _dt,
00379                   double _umin, double _umax, double _du,
00380                   double _vmin, double _vmax, double _dv,
00381                   double _phase = 2);
00382         virtual ~PolarSin () { }
00383 
00384         virtual void SetParameters(const ParameterMap &parms) {
00385 #       if 1
00386             for (ParameterMap::const_iterator i = parms.begin();
00387                  i != parms.end(); ++i) {
00388                 if (i->second->getName() == "Phase") Phase = double(*i->second);
00389             }
00390 #       else
00391             setParameter(parms, this->Phase, "Phase");
00392 #       endif
00393         }
00394 
00395     protected:
00396         virtual function_type f;
